header.email: In up to 5 minutes, you'll receive an email at {userEmail} with all your purchase details.{lineBreak}Remember to check your spam inbox
warnings.payment.approval: Payment approval may take up to 3 bussiness days
warnings.payment.bankInvoice.approval: Payment approval for bank invoices may take up to 3 bussiness days. If payment is not due, your order will be automatically cancelled
warnings.payment.bankInvoice.value.dueda: Please make a payment of {paymentValue} up to {paymentDueDate} according to the data below
warnings.payment.bankInvoice.value: Please make a payment of {paymentValue} up to the due date according to the data below
warnings.delivery.time: The delivery period starts from the moment your payment is confirmed
warnings.delivery.tracking: When your order is on its way, a tracking code will be sent to your email
warnings.pickup.time: The store pickup period starts from the moment your payment is confirmed
warnings.order.split: Your purchase was split into {numOrders} orders as some of the items were sold by partners. This does not affect shipping estimates
summary.shipping.quantity: {shippings, plural, one {.} other {, split into # deliveries}}
summary.pickup.quantity: {pickups, plural, one {.} other {, split into # pickups}}
order.split: Your order was split into {deliveries} deliveries{pickups, plural, =0 {} one {, in addition to a store pickup} other {, in addition to # store pickups}}{takeaways, plural, =0 {} one {and # takeaway item} other {and # takeaway itens}}. Products that are closer to their delivery address will arrive faster!
order.totals.subtotal: Subtotal ({numItems, plural, one {# item} other {# items}})
shipping.header.title: Delivery
pickup.header.title: Pickup
